scripts.project-setup: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.lint-fix: cd client && npm run lint-fix && cd ../server && npm run lint-fix
scripts.server: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.test: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm test
scripts.kill-run: npm run kill && NODE_ENV=development npm run server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NODE_ENV=production cd client && npm install && npm run build
